name: Bananabelt Raceway
description:
The new location for the annual space race is... THE GREAT BANANA BELT!
Welcome to the Banana Belt Raceway!
Speed's one thing, but to get a high score you need to hit the glowing rings!
(There is no end to the game, just survive!)
Racers, ready yourselves! GO!

An assignment designed to create an improved game based on some assets provided. I vamped up the art and style, re-wrote a lot of the code and added some extra obstacles such as the Tunnel Stations!

Controls:
WASD - Movement (Supports game controller )

All assets and sounds are free and royalty free.

BGM: Shape Shift - by PlayOnLoop (https://www.playonloop.com/royalty-free-music/electronic-edm-synth-music/)

See more on my ArtStation and Twitter! ~
